Title: Fun Run (1)
Plot: In the hour long season four premiere, Michael hosts a Fun Run for the Scranton Business Park. A freak accident leads him to believe the office is cursed, and he questions his employees' religious beliefs. The office relationships are also explored, with Pam and Jim's new romance and Dwight and Angela's continuing relationship.
GuestStars: Jackie Debatin, Marcus A. York, Rashida Jones, Robert R. Shafer, Omi Vaidya, Justin Spitzer, Silvia McClure, Takayo Fischer
